abstract: Brian T. Moynihan’s 2011 pay was significantly higher than the $1.9 million payout he received in 2010. But some other executives at Bank of America made more than he did.
snippet: Brian T. Moynihan’s 2011 pay was significantly higher than the $1.9 million payout he received in 2010. But some other executives at Bank of America made more than he did.
lead_paragraph: Brian T. Moynihan, chief executive of Bank of America, earned $8.1 million in 2011, a sharp increase from the $1.9 million payout he received in 2010.

headline.main: Bank of America Chief’s Pay Jumps to $8.1 Million
